abstract: Daniel Finkel leads us on an exploration of this classic nature puzzle.
snippet: Daniel Finkel leads us on an exploration of this classic nature puzzle.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Finkel will be leading our collaborative inquiry this week. Mr. Finkel is a true lover of both math and the outdoors and is uniquely qualified to attack this puzzle from any theoretical or practical angle. It's the classic (with a twist) What Color Was The Bear?

headline.main: Numberplay: What Color Was the Bear?
